name: Out Of Colours
description:
===============Controls===============

AMove LeftDMove RightSpaceJumpControlHold on to wall

TIP :  If you wall jump it makes you go further

HAVE FUN :D

This game is made for : ScoreSpace Jam #19

I started this project when the submission is due 2 days, what a grind.

===============NOTE===============

Im gonna fix some bugs and optimize it more, and have the option to make automatic hold to wall
